metadata.title: CVE-2023-52681 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:efivarfs: Free s_fs_info on unmountNow that we allocate a s_fs_info struct on fs context creation, weshould ensure that we free it again when the superblock goes away.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
